TXT_ASTUCE_8: This game is free, you can even access the source code
TXT_ASTUCE_7: The sale of a tower makes you recover 60 percent of its total price
TXT_ASTUCE_6: At each game over, you can save your score
TXT_ASTUCE_5: Stars allow you to have access to others playgrounds
TXT_ASTUCE_4: The ice towers slow creatures, place them strategically
TXT_ASTUCE_3: All tours are improvable through a few pieces of gold
TXT_DESC_TOUR_CANON: Slow tower with fairly good splash damage. It only attacks creatures on earth
TXT_ASTUCE_2: Beware not to get stuck with the flying waves
TXT_ASTUCE_1: The white circle around a tower indicates the range of the tower.
TXT_DESC_TOUR_FEU: Extremely fast tower which shoots fireballs. It attacks all types of creatures
TXT_DIALOG_ARRETER_PARTIE: Are you sure you would like to stop the game ?
TXT_DESC_TOUR_TERRE: Slow tower which making awesome splash damage with a very huge range. Unfortunately, it only attacks creatures on earth.
TXT_DESC_TOUR_ELECTRIQUE: Tower which emits powerful arcs to a relatively low frequency. It only attacks creatures on earth.
TXT_DESC_TOUR_ARCHER: Quick tower inflicts low damage. It attacks all types of creatures.
TXT_DESCR_CONSOLE_CHAT:
Awaiting start of the game...
This console allows you to communicate with others online players .
TXT_DIALOG_QUITTER_JEU: Are you sure you would like to quit the game ?
TXT_DESC_TOUR_AIR: It throws gusts that hurt all the flying creatures in its path. The damage from a burst decreases gradually. The indicated damage correspond to the damage inflicted at the source of the gust.
TXT_DIALOG_SAUVER: Would you like to save your score ?
TXT_CLIQUER_SUR_TERRAIN: Click on an available field to start the game.
TXT_DESC_TOUR_ANTI_AERIENNE: Very powerful tower but it only attacks flying creatures.
TXT_DESC_TOUR_GLACE: Quick tower that slows creatures. It attacks all types of creatures.
